FIGREF0.text: Phylogenetic trees of 56 ORF2 and 109 ORF2 gene of PCV3. a) ML tree of 56 ORF2 complete coding region sequences inferred by RAxML. b) the NJ tree of 56 ORF2 complete coding region, inferred by MEGA 7.0. c) the ML tree of 109 ORF2 complete coding region, inferred by RAxML. d) the NJ tree of 109 ORF2 complete coding region, inferred by MEGA 7.0.

FIGREF1.text: The Re of PCV3 in related sequences collected in 2015, 2016, and 2017. a) PCV3a, b) PCV3b.

FIGREF2.text: PCV3 distribution countries is marked in different colors and the association of geographical distribution of PCV3 in China is marked with a star.

FIGREF3.text: ML tree of 98 PCV3 complete coding sequences collected until May 6 th 2018 reconstructed using RAxML. We show that if the sequence number increases, the structure of the tree is stable to form PCV3a and PCV3b with a high confidence (bootstrap = 90).

FIGREF5.text: from amino site 297 is the cap coding region.
